Title: Children of Men
Writer: Alfonso Cuarón, Timothy J. Sexton, David Arata
Actors: Julianne Moore, Clive Owen, Chiwetel Ejiofor
Plot: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have somehow become infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.
Language: English, German, Italian, Romanian, Spanish, Arabic, Georgian, Russian, Serbian
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. 49 wins & 89 nominations total
